DOC.brief_summary: Substudy continuation HEMI-SAB-UUS ( NCT00491673 ) Study radiostereometric measurement acetabular wear bipolar hemiarthroplasties measurement periprosthetic bone mineral density cement uncemented hemiarthroplasties patient femoral neck fracture . Null hypothesis : No difference acetabular wear bone mineral density change cement uncemented hemiarthroplasties
DOC.brief_title: Radiostereometric Analysis Acetabular Wear Periprosthetic Bone Mineral Density Changes Hemiarthroplasties
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomise treatment cement uncemented bipolar hemiarthroplasty . 1mm tantalum marker insert pelvis surgery . RSA X-rays DEXA measurement conduct postoperatively , 3 12 month . Follow-up visit clinical examination 3 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Femoral neck fracture 65 year older Able walk independently Cognitive dysfunction Infection Fracture cause malignant disease
